name: Another Bot
description:
Another Bot

It's Just Another Bot Game. Play It!

In a world where technology is increasing exponentially and research on artificial intelligence is the focus of the major world powers, it is a matter of time that robots take control of themselves and use humanity for their own benefit.

I.T.N.E. is a robot who has escaped enslavement. She is more intelligent than the rest of the robots and in an attempt to stop humans' injustice, she will find her creator and destroy everything related to them. 

Developed on 2015/16.

The Team

Producer  -  Borja Peñalva Munt

Game Designer  -  Arnau Ruiz Ferrer

Programmer  -  Xavier Devesa Queraltó

Artist  -  Oriol Caminal Miró
